Description: Small model axe-head (?): of crescentic type, made from thin sheet metal. The ends of the lateral tangs are rounded, and it has a long central tang, which was made separately and attached to the blade by means of a rivet.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Thebes (historic - Upper Egypt) (said to come from)
Bibliographic references: Davies 1987 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities in the British Museum (91)
